page.title: 12Haverfordwest Aerodrome
page.content: Visiting Haverfordwest Aerodrome we learned some interesting things:- ...Dyfed County Council owns the airfield although they do not own any of the planes; ...Mr.Johnson(the Administrator) has been there for ten years; three people work there at a time; ...in 1939 it was built and housed {Lancasters {Wellingtons {Mosquitoes; ...there are two run_ways; ...you can go 'both ways' on the run-ways according to direction of the {<<< PREVAILING WIND >>> ...each August, when the County Show uses the airfield, one run-way has to be closed, and the other left open for {### Emergencies ### ...only three aircraft accidents have occurred....but none was serious.
